item.title: Inspirational Biographies of Extraordinary Athletes
item.description: Looking for some motivation to help you achieve your fitness goals? Look no further than these five inspirational biographies of extraordinary athletes who overcame obstacles and achieved greatness. Unbroken by Laura Hillenbrand, the incredible true story of Louis Zamperini, an Olympic runner who survived a plane crash during World War II and spent 47 days adrift in the Pacific Ocean before being captured by the Japanese. Despite enduring unspeakable torture and hardship as a prisoner of war, Zamperini refused to give up and ultimately emerged triumphant.
